VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Swiftcasting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in fishing speed that reduces the time spent on fishing jobs.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Catchmastery
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in fish catching that increases the amount of fish caught.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Aquabounty
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in getting lucky when fishing, catching special items that are not fish.
